original_text: She continued to say the same thing to Samson many times. Her words made Samson very upset. He felt that he wanted to die.
korean_text: 날마다 그 말로 그를 재촉하여 조르매 삼손의 마음이 번뇌하여 죽을 지경이라

sentences.original_text: She continued to say the same thing to Samson
Her words made Samson very upset
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀의 말은 삼손을 매우 화나게 했습니다

sentences.original_text: He felt that he wanted to die
